layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x176
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x176
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x160
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x140 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 200x140
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,60) size 200x20 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (60,60) size 80x20 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 22x18
                text run at (1,1) width 22: "foo"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,140) size 262x20 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 40x18
          text run at (1,1) width 40: "260px"
